description:
Save time by walking your dog on your treadmill!

If you have ever wanted to train your dog to walk on a treadmill then this course is for you. This is a free video course was produced to help dog owners / trainers learn how to train dogs to walk on a treadmill. It's fun, energetic and will take less than one hour. This video course takes four dogs threw the process who have never been on a treadmill before.

Reasons you may want to train your dog to walk on your treadmill:

  • You live in an extremely hot/cold climate.
  • You want to get things done while you oversee your dog getting exercise.
  • If your dog is reactive towards other dogs and it's hard to walk them at peek times when dogs in the neighborhood are out walking.
  • Mental and physical stimulation.
title: Dog Training: Train your dog to walk on a treadmill.
